author: Sara Ashley O'Brien, CNN Business
title: Coronavirus training by text message: How some companies are keeping workers informed
description: For Marcela Sapone, the decision to expand her company into food and essential deliveries during the coronavirus pandemic didn't come without careful consideration for its thousands of workers.
content:
